text: 35|39|avanan ninnale bhumiyil pratinidhikalakkiyavan. akayal vallavanum avisvasikkunna paksam avanre avisvasattinre deasam avann tanne. avisvasikalkk avarute avisvasam avarute raksitavinkal keapamallateannum vard'dhippikkukayilla. avisvasikalkk avarute avisvasam nastamallateannum vard'dhippikkukayilla
